name: C'me Rollin'
description:
A casual stage based mobile game where the player rides an office chair across the halls, trying to get to a set finish line while dodging the obstacles in his or her path, playable on an Android device. Set in the school hallways, the player is a student escaping from detention and fleeing from the teacher in charge.

   

  

Programming | UI Designer: fayemendoza 
ArtStation: https://fatimah_mendoza.artstation.com/

Character Artist | Animator: Fippler 
ArtStation: https://www.artstation.com/hazeo

Environment Artist | Level Designers:  MatthewCaddie & scorpiius
ArtStation:  https://www.artstation.com/matthewcaddie |  https://www.artstation.com/embaunton
